displayHeaderFooter.description: Display header and footer. Defaults to `false`.

footerTemplate.description: HTML template for the print footer. Should use the same format as the `headerTemplate`.

format.description: Paper format. If set, takes priority over `width` or `height` options. Defaults to 'Letter'.

headerTemplate.description:
HTML template for the print header. Should be valid HTML markup with following classes used to inject printing values
into them:
- `'date'` formatted print date
- `'title'` document title
- `'url'` document location
- `'pageNumber'` current page number
- `'totalPages'` total pages in the document

height.description: Paper height, accepts values labeled with units.

bottom.description: Bottom margin, accepts values labeled with units. Defaults to `0`.

left.description: Left margin, accepts values labeled with units. Defaults to `0`.

right.description: Right margin, accepts values labeled with units. Defaults to `0`.

top.description: Top margin, accepts values labeled with units. Defaults to `0`.

pageRanges.description: Paper ranges to print, e.g., '1-5, 8, 11-13'. Defaults to the empty string, which means print all pages.

path.description:
The file path to save the PDF to. If `path` is a relative path, then it is resolved relative to the current working
directory. If no path is provided, the PDF won't be saved to the disk.

preferCSSPageSize.description:
Give any CSS `@page` size declared in the page priority over what is declared in `width` and `height` or `format`
options. Defaults to `false`, which will scale the content to fit the paper size.

scale.description: Scale of the webpage rendering. Defaults to `1`. Scale amount must be between 0.1 and 2.

width.description: Paper width, accepts values labeled with units.
